name: 玄德
content: 锁定技，<procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickingTimeLimit class="irreplaceable"><tickingLimit class="irreplaceable"><preparingStage></preparingStage></tickingLimit></tickingLimit></procedureTrigger>，<you></you><draw><drawHead></drawHead><equaling><equalingHead0></equalingHead0><lostHealthPoints></lostHealthPoints>一半(<roundUp><roundUp0></roundUp0></roundUp>)</equaling>的<drawEnd></drawEnd></draw>。

role.lore: 濬哲文明，溫恭允塞，玄德升聞

name: 允中
content: <procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickingTimeLimit class="irreplaceable"><tickingLimit class="irreplaceable"><actingStage></actingStage></tickingLimit><numberLimit class="irreplaceable"><numberLimiting><numberLimitingHead></numberLimitingHead>一<numberLimitingEnd></numberLimitingEnd></numberLimiting></numberLimit></tickingLimit></procedureTrigger>，<you></you><can><canHead></canHead><or><make><makeHead></makeHead><roleSelector class="irreplaceable"><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable"></targetNumberLimit><targetLimit class="irreplaceable"><handCard></handCard>最多的<roleDefault></roleDefault></targetLimit></roleSelector><each><eachHead></eachHead><discard><discardBody1></discardBody1></discard><selector class="irreplaceable"><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable">一张</targetNumberLimit><cardDefault></cardDefault></selector></each></make><orBody></orBody><make><makeHead></makeHead><roleSelector class="irreplaceable"><targetNumberLimit class="irreplaceable"></targetNumberLimit><targetLimit class="irreplaceable"><handCard></handCard>最少的<roleDefault></roleDefault></targetLimit></roleSelector><each><eachHead></eachHead><draw><drawHead></drawHead>一张<drawEnd></drawEnd></draw></each></make></or></can>。

name: 鸿志
content: 锁定技，<procedureTrigger class="irreplaceable"><tickLimit class="irreplaceable"><when><whenHead></whenHead><tickQuantifier>一名</tickQuantifier><role></role><whenEnteringDying></whenEnteringDying></when></tickLimit></procedureTrigger>，你摸两张牌；当一名角色死亡时，你摸一张牌。

role.lore: 嗟乎，燕雀安知鴻鵠之志哉

name: 狐鸣
content: 锁定技，出牌阶段，你可多使用其他受伤角色数张【杀】。

role.lore: 狐鳴呼曰：「大楚興，陳勝王」
